    • Method Detail

      • subscribeEmail

        public java.lang.String subscribeEmail(java.lang.String code,
                                       java.lang.String email)
        Description copied from interface: EmailDAO
        Stores an email address for subscription to notifications for a specific exchange. If the email doesn't exist, a token is generated and returned. If it exists, the previously generated token is returned.
        Specified by:
        subscribeEmail in interface EmailDAO
        Parameters:
        code - for the exchange to subscribe to
        email - the address of the user that wants to subscribe
        Returns:
        the token corresponding to the newly created or pre-existing email address

      • registerEmail

        public void registerEmail(java.lang.String token)
        Specified by:
        registerEmail in interface EmailDAO

      • unregisterEmail

        public void unregisterEmail(java.lang.String token)
        Description copied from interface: EmailDAO
        Unregisters the email address associated to this token. Notice that one email address can have several tokens associated to it, one for each exchange the user has subscribed to. Any of this tokens can be used to remove all the users subscriptions in one call to this method
        Specified by:
        unregisterEmail in interface EmailDAO
        Parameters:
        token - a token associated to an email address

      • tokenByEmail

        public java.lang.String tokenByEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Specified by:
        tokenByEmail in interface EmailDAO

      • getEmailsForNotification

        public java.util.List<Email> getEmailsForNotification(java.lang.String code)
        Description copied from interface: EmailDAO
        Gets a list of email addresses for users subscribed to changes on the rates of the exchange identified by the code specified.
        Specified by:
        getEmailsForNotification in interface EmailDAO
        Parameters:
        code - the code of the exchange with the modified rates
        Returns:
        the list of email addresses to send changes to
